title: JobCopilot
description:
JobCopilot helps you get more job interviews by automating job applications. Your AI JobCopilot auto-applies up to 1,500 relevant jobs each month, from over 300,000 companies worldwide.

JobCopilot also includes a full suite of AI tools to assist you throughout your job search: AI Resume Builder, AI Cover Letter Builder, Job Interview Roleplaying Chatbot, Job Offer Negotiation and Career Assistants.
